ingredients.item: 3 green peppers, cut into small chunks
2 tsp Marigold Organic Swiss Vegetable Vegan Bouillon Powder
2 x 160g portions frozen Waitrose Garden Vegetable Steamers

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the peppers and onions for 8 minutes, stirring frequently. Add the garlic and fry for a further 2 minutes. Stir in the rice, paella paste, vegetable bouillon powder and 600ml water.
Bring to a gentle simmer, cover with a lid and cook for 15-20 minutes until the rice is tender and the water absorbed. Add a dash more water if the pan seems dry before the rice is cooked.
Stir in the vegetable steamers and half the parsley and cook for 5 minutes until the vegetables are tender, then season. Scatter with the remaining parsley and the lime slices to serve.
